refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: BIO_f_null() returns the null filter BIO method. This is a filter BIO that does nothing.
All requests to a null filter BIO are passed through to the next BIO in the chain: this means that a BIO chain containing a null filter BIO behaves just as though the BIO was not there.

refsection.title: NOTES
refsection.para: As may be apparent a null filter BIO is not particularly useful.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: BIO_f_null() returns the null filter BIO method.
